scenes.heading: INT. SUBURBAN HOME - CHRISTMAS PARTY - NIGHT
scenes.actionPreview: A classic Christmas Eve large family gathering. Big tree. Caroling around the piano. Children of all ages running around. Joy and merriment, libations and big feelings. Young JACK O’MALLEY-- age 12-- slips away. Up to something. He glides into the entryway, eyeing the piled coats and handbags, check

scenes.heading: INT. UPSTAIRS - SAME

dialogues.text: How did you find this stuff?
I told you, I can find anything or anyone. KID 2
Look, I don’t know what this stuff is... but Santa is coming tonight.
Jack... what are ya doing, pal? Look, we love having you here on the holidays. And I’m sorry about your mother’s... situation. But what are you telling your cousins?
“The cold hard truth?” Jack... these are presents, yes. But they’re not
Yeah, it’s Christmas Eve. He’s coming tonight.
And he’s also going to go to
Carrots! Look, I don’t know exactly how it works, alright? All I know is, when we wake up in the morning,
Honestly, Uncle Rick, I’m not that worried about it.

scenes.actionPreview: A group of KIDS huddles around Jack, as he uses the keys to UNLOCK a closet door revealing-- A BUNCH OF WRAPPED PRESENTS. The kids are shell-shocked. Crestfallen. Trying to process. We’re being played. Now pay up. The kids start handing over candy from their pockets-- they obviously lost a bet. KID

scenes.heading: INT. LIVING ROOM - LATER
scenes.actionPreview: On the mantle, a plate of cookies and a glass of milk, with a note-- “For Santa”. Then Jack appears-- GRABS a cookie and takes a big bite. Then the milk-- BOTTOMS UP. And as he GRABS the remaining cookies and heads off, we-- CUT TO:

scenes.heading: INT. A BUSY COFFEE SHOP - DAY
scenes.actionPreview: Bustling with activity and decorated for Christmas. A CARD informs us -- “30 years later” A BARISTA sets down a large to-go cup in frame-- A customer, CHRISTINE, takes her coffee to the prep area. Starts adding milk. And as she turns to reach for a sugar -- A HAND enters frame and deftly STEALS the

scenes.heading: EXT. SIDEWALK - DAY - MOMENTS LATER

dialogues.text: Len, it’s Jack. CONTINUED: (2) (CONTINUED) 2nd BLUE REVISED - 04/18/23
Are you seriously trying to place
What part of “I have the money” don’t you understand? So be a good little scumbag and put me down for fifty large on
You my mother now? Just place the bet. I gotta go. Goodbye.
Among all the various activities going on in the park, Jack clocks:

Dusty! -- STRAIGHT AT the running Guard, tangling his legs in their leashes and sending him sprawling to the ground! The fire extinguisher goes FLYING and when it lands, Jack casually KICKS it into the bushes-- out of sight.

scenes.actionPreview: ECU - THE COFFEE CUP WITH “CHRISTINE!” WRITTEN ON IT And as he finally raises the cup to his lips, we WIDEN TO REVEAL the thief is none other than: JACK O'MALLEY. Grown-up now, having adult-ed himself into a rakish scoundrel. Still an operator and cynical to the bone; the kind of guy who smiles in y

scenes.heading: INT. NOGA BUILDING - CONTINUOUS
scenes.actionPreview: Jack loops the lanyard around his neck and casually makes his way through the halls, smiling and nodding at every lanyarded SCIENTIST he passes. He reaches a door labeled -- “Seismic Monitoring-- Access Restricted”-- SWIPES Janine’s ID and -- bing! -- the door slides open.

scenes.heading: INT. DR. JANINE’S LAB - CONTINUOUS
scenes.actionPreview: A supercomputer lab. Dedicated to the observation of tsunamis, earthquakes and volcanoes. And at the heart of the room: a SUPERCOMPUTER that receives real-time data from the sea floor. Despite warnings to the contrary plastered all over it, Jack find and opens the back of a computer and surveys its

scenes.heading: EXT. PARK - MOMENTS LATER
scenes.actionPreview: Mission accomplished, Jack exits the building. The Guard has apparently found the fire extinguisher and is trying to PUT OUT the gazebo as the HIIT class watches on. With all the drama, Jack is able to stealthily return Janine’s ID. But as he does so, he senses -- -- that baby. Still looking at him,

scenes.heading: INT. SHOPPING MALL - PHILADELPHIA - CONTINUOUS

dialogues.text: We’ve got a 5’11” Grown-Up, male, hovering near the scented candles. Keep an eye out.
Copy, Chief. I got eyes on him.
Hi Santa. We made cookies for you.
You know, I’ve been meaning to talk to you two. Come here a minute--
What’s up Stew Crew! It’s Beef Stew here and I’m on a mission to give Santa what HE really wants for Christmas-- a Stew Crew t- shirt! So let’s see if we can get the man to wear it--
Sir, you can’t cut the line.
Ah, come on, Big Dude! No Christmas love for the Beef?
These kids have been waiting a long time. CONTINUED: (2) (CONTINUED) PINK REVISED - 11/2/22
Look, man, it’ll take 2 minutes. I just need him to put on the shirt and say “Now we beefin’!” This will totally go viral.
Don’t be a dick, man. I just need him to put on the shirt for--
Sir. Perhaps I didn’t make myself clear. (intense)
Now I believe you kids have an appointment to get to.

scenes.actionPreview: A mid-to-up-scale suburban shopping mall, packed with HOLIDAY SHOPPERS. We move through the scene, past IRRITATED CUSTOMERS packed in like sardines, STRESSED OUT PARENTS fighting each other over the dwindling items on shelves, BRATTY KIDS screaming and breaking things. “ It’s the hap-happiest season

scenes.heading: INT. MALL - LATER

dialogues.text: Just what I needed. So important to get out. Talk to the kids. Recharge the battery. Best part of the job.
You know you love it. (trying to remember)
Yo! Merry Christmas, Santa! -- but Cal’s fist INTERCEPTS it. Never stopping, he sniffs, hands it to the big man.
...if they sold those American Girl beach pajamas out from under me, I will bash someone’s skull.
Approaching ground floor. Let’s heat up

scenes.actionPreview: Their work complete, Cal guides Nick through the crowd, moving with the intensity of the Secret Service escorting the President. Yeah. Nothing like a crowded mall two days before Christmas. Where’d we go last year? Cleveland. As they approach the top of an escalator, a VENDOR at a hot dog cart TOSSE

scenes.heading: INT. SERVICE TUNNEL - MOMENTS LATER

dialogues.text: I should have worn my other boots.
Ice Breaker in position and ready to roll.

scenes.actionPreview: As Cal escorts Nick through a service tunnel-- Over Cal’s radio-- He OPENS the door into--

scenes.heading: INT. PARKING GARAGE - CONTINUOUS

dialogues.text: The other boots have better arch support... Thanks, Ginevra.
Sure thing, Red. CONTINUED: (CONTINUED) PINK REVISED - 11/2/22

scenes.actionPreview: Mostly empty. Where NICK’S MOTORCADE awaits-- three WHITE SUBURBANS. The kind of convoy that might move a foreign dignitary-- except all snow white. AGENT GINEVRA stands by the open door of the center car-- 8. CONTINUED: (CONTINUED) WHITE DRAFT - 9/24/22 9. Nick climbs in, Cal right behind him.

scenes.heading: INT. ICEBREAKER - CONTINUOUS
scenes.actionPreview: As they settle in, Cal asks the DRIVER-- The Driver pats a HUGE BLACK GARBAGE BAG, stuffed full, on the seat next to him. Cal nods.

scenes.heading: EXT. MALL - MOMENTS LATER

dialogues.text: It won’t be the same without you, Cal.
It will be exactly the same without me. CONTINUED: (CONTINUED) WHITE DRAFT - 9/24/22
Garcia has been preparing for this for decades. You couldn’t ask for a better replacement.
You stubborn pain in the neck.

scenes.actionPreview: The Ice Breaker motorcade emerges from the garage and TAKES OFF, across town. EXT./INT. ICEBREAKER - CONTINUOUS As the motorcade traverses the city, every light “magically” turns GREEN for them, then immediately changes to RED once they pass. Cal stares out the windows, always on watch. 9. CONTINUED

scenes.heading: EXT. MCGUIRE AIR FORCE BASE - NEW JERSEY - CONTINUOUS

dialogues.text: Red. Good to see ya. Successful excursion?
The mall at Christmas time... It’s like oxygen for me.
What are you all so excited about?
Oh, you wanna know what’s in here? Is this what’s got your interest...?
Okay, now. One at a time!
Every time we come to Philly. (then)
Cal! Come on, man! Clock’s tickin’! AND IN A SERIES OF SHOTS, WE SEE: -- The F22 Raptors fire up their engines.
Red One, you are clear for take-off.

scenes.actionPreview: The East Coast’s USAF Air Mobility Command. The Icebreaker is waved through the base to arrive at -- A TOP-SECRET HANGAR The Icebreaker pulls up and parks next to twin F22 RAPTOR FIGHTER JETS! As Cal and Nick exit, the base’s GENERAL steps up to greet them. Before the General can respond, they’re cu

scenes.heading: EXT. NICK’S SLEIGH - CONTINUOUS

dialogues.text: All right, ladies. Let’s go home.

scenes.actionPreview: On The Sleigh, Nick watches as the Raptors ROAR down the runway and TAKE OFF into the sky. Once they’re clear-- And with a mighty EFFORT, they start PULLING the massive chariot down the runway-- a strip of which is covered in snow for the Sleigh-- faster, faster-- building to a GALLOP-- Their ANTLER

scenes.heading: EXT. SKY OVER NEW JERSEY COAST - MOMENTS LATER

dialogues.text: Thanks for the escort, fellas. See you next year! (to his team, in Greek) KAVALAME!!
STREAKS across the sky at hypersonic speeds, crossing the globe in a blink. But as it reaches the Arctic Circle... PULL BACK to reveal THE INVISIBLE PHYSICS OF THEIR PASSAGE -- where we actually

Randall, it’s Jack. The money line is still Moseley at plus four hundred? Okay, put me down for fifty dimes on Moseley. (listens) I’ll have the money. Also the Lions getting three and half for another fifty. (beat)

scenes.actionPreview: AERIAL POV: from below and behind the twin Raptors, roaring side-by-side through the air, only empty sky between them... ...until we BOOM UP TO REVEAL, like an optical illusion, Nick’s sleigh and reindeer right there, flying in formation between the escorts -- their presence, by some combination of

scenes.heading: INT. JERSEY APARTMENT - SAME TIME

dialogues.text: I got it. I don’t know what the hell it is- - but I got it.
Yeah. Why don’t you send me something first.
Wiring the first half now, the rest when the data is verified.
And Moseley is not getting up!!! Fort knocks out Moseley in the 2nd!

scenes.actionPreview: ON THE SUPER-COMPUTER-- as the seismic activity STOPS DEAD in the heart of the Arctic. COORDINATES blink a location. Jack hits a button on his keyboard and auto-dials a number on the Dark Web. A MENACING, DIGITALLY-ENCRYPTED VOICE answers-- On one of the monitors-- “TRANSACTION-CONFIRMED” . Jack pum

scenes.heading: EXT. NICK’S SLEIGH - TWILIGHT

dialogues.text: As the Sleigh GLIDES for the center of town, we get glimpses of the North Pole’s WONDROUS SIGHTS and MAGICAL DENIZENS.
(our Arctic spin on elves, brownies and faeries) churning out ribbons, bows and wrapping paper in every color imaginable...

-- Nick’s regal home. The residence and central command of all North Pole operations. Like the White House, this is where he lives and works-- along with many other senior HELPERS, including Cal. DROP DOWN TO-- A PLAZA, just in front of The Palace, where we find a quaint little cabin--

scenes.actionPreview: as it flies over the NORTH POLE and we establish the JAW- DROPPING SIZE and SPECTACLE of the Capitol of Christmas! (CONTINUED) BLUE REVISED - 10/11/22 14. CONTINUED: (CONTINUED) WHITE DRAFT - 9/24/22 15. A MASSIVE CRYSTALLINE MEGA-CITY, GLOWING with the MAGIC OF Over the colorful DYE POOLS, busy wit

scenes.heading: INT. MAIN DECK - PALACE - SAME

dialogues.text: Where’s the Missus? CONTINUED: (CONTINUED) WHITE DRAFT - 9/24/22
Nothin’. Everybody’s working. The updated routing is on your desk, if you want to take a look. They’re re-thinking South
Hate to interrupt. Going to check in with

scenes.actionPreview: Mission Control meets Sleigh Hangar. The nerve center of this massive operation, teeming with activity. Overhanging everything, a large clock labeled “T minus” counts down the time til launch-- “28:32:11” then “28:32:10” ... Stepping off, Nick hands the reins to the REINDEER HANDLER. 15. CONTINUED:

scenes.heading: INT. PALACE GYM - NIGHT

dialogues.text: 499. And... five hundred. In two minutes.
By the way, I got a call from Joey in
How many more do we need?
About a hundred and thirty six thousand.
What do I have to worry about? I’ve got you. I’m the luckiest guy in town.
I was thinking, this year, on the day after, let’s just stay home, order in. (CONTINUED) GOLDENROD REVISED - 12/04/22
Alright, I’m gonna run the simulation model for Belgium and Holland again, just to be safe. (to Cal)
Tell me why. CONTINUED: (CONTINUED) GOLDENROD REVISED - 12/04/22
Time for a change, Nick. Like I told you.
We work for the kids, Cal. We do it for them. And I know you love that. You live for that. So what’s going on here?
I love the kids. Of course I do. It’s the grownups that are killin’ me.
These last few years... each of the NL
Yes. I’m aware. What are you getting at, Cal?
You gonna make me say it? For the first time ever... there are more people on the Naughty List than not. (searches for the words) CONTINUED: (2) (MORE) (CONTINUED) WHITE DRAFT - 9/24/22
You say it all the time-- “We
If nothing matters to them, then it seems to me they need us now more than ever.
That’s why there’s only one you. The world needs you, Nick. (then)
But that’s not our job, Cal. (beat)
We work for the kids, Cal. Even when they’re not kids anymore.
It’s just getting harder and harder to see it. For me. And that’s
(heard it before) --burn over 430 million calories on Christmas Eve.

scenes.actionPreview: Nick’s private gym. A stunning, modernist space. Part Zen mediation room, part Iron Paradise™. A lot of gear. Nick does PUSH-UPS, as Mrs. Claus times him with a stopwatch-- Not bad. Sports Memorabilia. He says they’re a little behind on football jerseys, but he thinks we’ll be ok. He laughs. 17. CON

scenes.heading: EXT. ARCTIC WASTELANDS - NIGHT
scenes.actionPreview: Lashing blizzards and jagged ice as far as the eye can see. Then, through the winterscape, FIND something else-- A LINE of MERCENARIES moving through the squall. Dressed in snow camo, they navigate the icy crevasses and razor-sharp frost formations. The crew is fighting their way through icy hell wh

scenes.heading: EXT. MAIN PLAZA - NORTH POLE - LATE NIGHT

dialogues.text: What are you all doing out on the town?
Will you actualize something for us? KID 2
Alpha check. It’s Drift. Looks like a light just fried on the anterior West face, up around Mail Room 19B. Anyone up there?
Yeah, this is Jeff in Maintenance. You don’t miss a thing, Commander. I’ll check it out.
Hey, Jeff, looks like we got a few more of ‘em too. What’s goin’ on up there?
Arthur? Is he still up there? INTERCUT: E.L.F. AGENT ARTHUR checks a Workshop space. Empty. 35
Negative, Chief. BACK TO-- Cal-- TRACK WITH HIM as he picks up his pace 36
Gorman, are you in the residence? INTERCUT: AGENT GOORMAN-- -- (a very tough Gnome) outside the bedroom-- CONTINUED: (CONTINUED) BLUE REVISED - 10/11/22
Yeah, Cal. He went down to the galley 20 minutes ago. Hasn’t come back yet. BACK TO SHOT: as Cal’s footsteps start to come a little 38
I need eyes on Red NOW!
The elevator OPENS onto a corridor-- and now Cal’s RUNNING.
-- where he finds the refrigerator OPEN.
CODE GREEN! TWO ARMORED SNOWCATS HEADING NORTH! PRINCIPAL ON-BOARD! FULL LOCKDOWN!

scenes.actionPreview: The city is sleepier now, but never sleeping-- various DENIZENS on their way home for the day, a FEW on the night shift, a handful of ICE SKATERS getting in a few laps... Returning from a walk thru the city that has been his home for hundreds of years, Cal breathes it in, a bit sentimental. A few yo

scenes.heading: EXT. NORTH POLE CITY STREETS - CONTINUOUS

dialogues.text: They split up! I’m taking Northbound on

scenes.actionPreview: The Snowcat DRIFTS WILDLY around corners, while Cal charges across the rooftops, a force of nature unto himself. He LEAPS onto a CHUTE, knocking gifts out of the way-- PARKOUR-ING across the North Pole infrastructure like an obstacle course. But when the Snowcats reach one of the GATED PASSAGES-- th

scenes.heading: INT. E.L.F. CENTRAL CONTROL ROOM - LATER

dialogues.text: HOW THE #&%* DID THAT THING GET INTO OUR AIRSPACE UNDETECTED?!
We can’t see it! They must be using some kind of radar jam.
But we’re 24 hours to Christmas Eve and--
Okay... Okay. Start at the beginning.

They cut a hole in the CF Dome with an atomic plasma torch. From the footprints, I’d say eight to ten of them. Human. Rolled in with two remote armored Snowcats, used them as a diversion and blasted out in a NORAD- blind cargo jet.
(deadly serious) I’m gonna find him, Zoe.
We were just told that someone hacked the Intercontinental Seismic
We don’t know yet. The Trolls are scouring the web.
Well, tell them to work faster! We don’t have time to wait for their--
Director! The Trolls have a trace.
We traced the relays. Looks like “The
He’s the guy who found El Chapo. He’s also the guy who found people
You did not have a good night last night,
It was a stupid bet. I told you that.
If I didn’t do stuff that people thought was stupid, I wouldn’t be where I am today.
Look Randall, I’ll get you the money, alright? When have I ever lied to you?
That’s open to interpretation. I’ll get it to you--
Not my problem. Your bill is past due. It already was and then last night you doubled it. So today will be the day. Call who you gotta call, do what you gotta do... But the story is called--
That depends. What do you want?
I need you to do me a favor and go pick up
I’m right in the middle of something important. This is not a good time for me -- INTERCUT CALL: DR. OLIVIA MORELLO, MD at the hospital; Jack in his apartment.
Yeah, me either. I got two mothers-to-be with weakening contractions and labor that’s not progressing. And Craig’s out of town.
Dylan got in trouble. I need you to pick him up and take him back to my place.
Jack . I’m stuck at work. Craig’s away.

scenes.actionPreview: Cal BURSTS through the door into the teeming DefCon 1 CHAOS. Full-on crisis mode-- the biggest imaginable crisis . And from the look on Cal’s face, you wouldn’t want to be whoever did this-- CONTINUED: (CONTINUED) WHITE DRAFT - 9/24/22 25. CONTINUED: (CONTINUED) WHITE DRAFT - 9/24/22 26. Cal PICKS U

scenes.heading: EXT. MARSHALL JUNIOR HIGH - THIRTY MINUTES LATER
scenes.actionPreview: DYLAN -- 12, moody -- waits on the sidewalk with the VICE PRINCIPAL, guitar case in one hand, chip on his punky shoulder. He’ll be a confident, good looking kid someday... but right now he’s prepubescent, awkward and not looking forward to whatever’s about to happen here. Soon, he spies Jack’s car a

scenes.heading: INT. JACK’S CAR - CONTINUOUS

dialogues.text: The handle’s busted! You gotta really pull on it... Just give it a good--
(to the other drivers) OH, SHUT UP!! (to Dylan)
What are you talkin’ about? Of course, you do...
Tampered with the school’s attendance records. Which... I did.
The music teacher leaves his computer open during 5th period. I started ditching
He’s my best friend. At least, he
Kevin found out and he wanted to ditch too. And he’s not even in jazz band! He just wanted to hang out with Piper!
So instead I gave him three more Absents.
He got busted. Told the Vice Principal what I was doing... (then)
No. We left her out of this.
Just so we have our story straight, what are we telling your mother?
You just keep quiet. I’ll deal with her.
(indicates the guitar) I gotta go practice. I’ve got this dumb winter pageant thing tonight with jazz band.
I know. I said it was dumb.
Well... good luck. CONTINUED: (2) (CONTINUED) BLUE REVISED - 10/11/22
Then it did. Thank you for getting him. (glances at the door, a little worried)
Yeah, well... At least he’s not biting people anymore.
He hasn’t bitten anyone since he was six.
He’ll be fine. He’s a good kid.
At least that’s what I’ve been told.
You know, this can be a hard age for kids.
Well... you and Craig are great with this stuff. You’re doing a great job, so far.
What are you talking about? I just picked him up! Look, I gotta get going... I have to work.

scenes.actionPreview: Jack’s tried to pull himself together a little, but his SUNGLASSES and BARELY TAMED HAIR give away the hangover. Dylan loads his guitar in back, then goes to open the passenger door; Jack yells to him through the window-- Dylan struggles with the door as the Vice Principal watches, unimpressed with

scenes.heading: EXT. JACK’S APARTMENT BUILDING - LATER
scenes.actionPreview: Jack returns home, dusting off his second churro, his conversation with Olivia reverberating in his head.... And as he heads for the front door, he spots-- --a DELIVERY TRUCK parked on the street outside, a WORKER hovering near the back, not really working. Wait, did that worker just clock him? Jack

scenes.heading: INT. JACK’S APARTMENT BUILDING - CONTINUOUS
scenes.actionPreview: Jack climbs the stairwell to his 4th floor corridor. But as he nears his apartment, he notices two more STONE-FACED WORKERS approaching from the far end of the hall. And then the elevator opens up behind him and two more grim WORKERS close in from the opposite direction. Ooo-kay. Jack is about to op

scenes.heading: EXT. JACK’S APARTMENT - CONTINUOUS
scenes.actionPreview: Jack DANGLES from the window sill, then FREE-CLIMBS his way to a drain pipe and SLIDES down to ground level. Scot free, he rounds the corner-- -- and walks right into a GLOWING ACQUIESCER held at his throat by ZOE-- ZAAAAAPPPP!!! The BLINDING LIGHT overtakes him-- then he bows his head and offers hi

scenes.heading: INT. JACK’S APARTMENT - DAY

dialogues.text: Once again, I don’t know what you’re talking about. But I work for whoever pays me.

You have about 40 seconds to become helpful before you have a terrible accident and donate your brain to science. I will get the information one way or another. So I’m going to ask you one more time-- who hired you to find him?
I promise you, I don’t. If I did, I would tell you. I’m not a scrupulous person. Ask anyone.
It was a weird job. Somebody looking for somebody who’s conducting tests on some kind of weapons system in the Arctic. I found the location and walked away.
I told you, I don’t know! All communication was encrypted and untraceable. Which is how it’s supposed to be, so that if somebody like, say,
You really don’t know what you did, do you?
I guess not. I can tell that you’re very upset about it though.
Box him up. He’s coming with us.

scenes.actionPreview: Jack is now restrained in a chair, with technology seemingly from the future. Zoe stands over him, surrounded by her team-- most of which Jack beat down moments ago and their feelings about him are clear. Zoe touches the Acquiescer to his forehead and with a more gentle --ZIP!-- Jack JERKS-- opens h

scenes.heading: INT. MORA BLACK OPS FIELD SITE - DAY

dialogues.text: Nice place. How long you been here?
We’re the multilateral international organization responsible for securing and protecting the Mythological world.
Oooo-kay. So like... Big Foot, the Loch
OHMYGOD! --the Horse COMES DOWN HARD, as 3 HANDLERS in FLAME RETARDANT UNIFORMS regain control of their long leads-- then start to LEAD the Horse away,
If he knows anything, he’s not talking.
Alright-- horse back to The Pen, body back to Area 32. And get the pumpkin back in the cryo-vault STAT.
Have a seat. CONTINUED: (2) (CONTINUED) WHITE DRAFT - 9/24/22
The Horseman. We’re questioning all the usual suspects.
What did that taser thing do to my head?!
It’s not a taser, it’s an Acquiescer. Just take a deep breath and have a seat.
The Horseman is actually the perfect analogy. There’s what you think you know.
Last night, at roughly 11pm NPST, Red One, also known as Saint Nicholas of Myra, was abducted from the North Pole Complex.
The data that you retrieved from the I- triple-S appears to have been used to pinpoint the location of the North Pole, which has been secure and classified for several hundred years.
Alright, first of all, the location of the
The Complex is not actually located at the geographic North Pole. That’s a cover for security purposes.
So the actual North Pole is--
Your day is about to get worse.
It turns out that Jack here didn’t know what he was doing. Somebody hired him to find the complex and, incredibly, he did.
I don’t know. CONTINUED: (5) (CONTINUED) YELLOW REVISED - 11/8/22
It was all anonymous, encrypted communication through dark channels. We checked his computer.
They always know something. Sometimes you just have to shake it out.
I’m not gonna like you. I can tell. Of everybody here, I like you the least.
Yeah, Chief? --and his eyes go wide--
I’m afraid we may have to.
Cal, let’s talk about this for a minute. CONTINUED: (6) (CONTINUED) YELLOW REVISED - 11/8/22
There’s nothing to talk about. This guy’s on the list. You can’t believe anything he says.
You know goddam well what list.
I’m not on any watch-list-- (dawns on him)
You’re telling me this clown is a Level 4
I know this is killing you.
We’re gonna put him to work. CONTINUED: (8) (CONTINUED) YELLOW REVISED - 11/8/22
You said you work for whoever pays you.
We don’t need this guy, Zoe.
I don’t like it either. But he’s the best tracker in the world, Cal. He found him once. Maybe he can do it again.
He’s not telling us what he knows.
Well, hold on-- how much are we talking about here?
Is there something you’re not telling me,
I don’t know who it is! But I can figure out where they are! Or where they
It’s all anonymous but I need insurance.
Then I suggest you do it.
Can we go back to the “paying me” part, for a minute?
Fine. But until we find him, you work for me.
Whoever it is... they’re in Aruba.
Hold on! Anyone dealing with me will smell coordinated teams moving in, a mile away.
I’m not rolling into Aruba undercover
We can’t trust this guy, Director.
That’s why you’re holding the leash. And
, like a high-tech slap bracelet/ankle monitor.
-- is how I can find you anywhere on

scenes.actionPreview: A large warehouse/Black Ops sight, which has been turned into a temporary Command Post for Zoe and her TEAM. One corner of the global response to the biggest mythological crisis in over a century. CONTINUED: (2) (CONTINUED) WHITE DRAFT - 9/24/22 39. CONTINUED: (CONTINUED) WHITE DRAFT - 9/24/22 40. A

scenes.heading: INT. BLUE’S LAIR

dialogues.text: Who do you have in mind, mum?

scenes.actionPreview: Elsewhere in this darkened labyrinth, Blue watches as her Mercs tend to a large, industrial machine of some kind. The LEAD MERC approaches-- Blue OPENS a nearby pelican case, REVEALING-- a small glass globe. Is it a Christmas ornament? No... A snow globe. But not of the kitschy, gift shop variety. T

dialogues.text: I’m the Commander of the E.L.F.
As far as you’re concerned, it stands for “Extremely Large and Formidable”.

He got sick once. It took 250 years for humanity to recover.
Hope is more fragile than anyone realizes.
Okay... but worst case scenario... is there someone else who can step in this year? Like a Vice-Santa?

dialogues.text: Okay, I can’t believe I’m asking this-- what’s the deal with Santa and his brother?
They used to work together. A long time ago. Back in the beginning... Red gave gifts to well behaved children. And The
You mean... Santa’s brother started the

He went out on his own. Eventually hooked up with the Witch, who was also in the punishment game. Working Iceland and several other Nordic territories. They were together for years, but it ended badly.
Does The Brother have a name or is it just “Santa’s Brother”?
His name... is Krampus. MOMENTS LATER--
Now listen to me-- I don’t know what’s waiting for us in here. The Brother, The
So don’t start a fight with a witch. Guess what-- I didn’t need you to tell me that.

If Nick is here, he’s probably being held in the dungeon. There’s a door around back that the guards use. We’ll need to quietly sneak through the courtyard, past the guillotines, break in and head down.
Past the guillotines, make a right. Got it.
Also-- do not touch anything. Under any circumstances. There is much here, not of the natural world. You’re human and therefore weak. So if you need to touch something, get me to do it.
Ya know, thinking about it, this feels like a good job for

(hard to say) I couldn’t see it anymore.

scenes.heading: INT. KRAMPUS'S CASTLE - NIGHT

dialogues.text: . Part mythic horned demon/part Tony Montana. Eight feet tall. Feral and shirtless, revealing his enormously muscular-- and furry-- torso. Master of this Domain.
It’s the official game of Krampusnacht.
Uh, Jack O'Malley, sir... or Lord...
The big one was armed with this.
A Northern Vambrace. Thank you very much.
And you thought he would be here. (then)
He was taken from The Compound. By The
Yes. And I know that she was here not long ago.
You and she were partners once. Roaming the countrysides, the villages.
That was a long time ago. (wistful)
Good friend of mine. Here to celebrate the
Many years ago, she gave me a gift. She came because she wanted it back.
The Glaskäfig . On its face, a simple glass snow globe. But its true purpose is nefarious....
She wants to punish them all. CONTINUED: (5) (CONTINUED) GOLDENROD REVISED - 12/04/22
The Glaskäfig is solitude. A prison for but one.
Krampus... I have to find him.
And why would I do that?
Now more than ever, we need him. And
You. Get out. And deliver my message to that MORA scum. CONTINUED: (6) (MORE) (CONTINUED) BUFF REVISED - 01/03/23
You mean... I can get out of here?
Mr... Lord Krampus... you and I are not so different. (then) I mean, we’re pretty different, but I think we have some stuff in common.
I suspect you’re a gambler. So am I.
When we walked in, my guy here told me he thinks he can beat you at your game...
I told him “no way”. But now, seeing how fired up he is... I like my odds. (then)
Unless, ya know, you’d rather not, for some reason. I mean, I get it, he’s a big guy. And there’s a lot of people watching.
Imbeciles! I love it! CUT TO:
TIGHT ON-- Cal moving into position at the Krampusschlap table. Nearby, Krampus works the crowd.
He actually slapped someone’s face off once.
(shrugs) I’m a gambler. I like the scrappy underdog.
The rules are as follows-- the contestants will exchange blows, in turn. The first to be knocked out or die, loses.
I’m trying to decide whether you’re brave or a fool.
Hard to say, right at the moment.
He’s still your brother. And he’s never given up on
And what do you know about it?
Yes... but then you also think that you can defeat me at Krampusschlap. (leans in)
I wish there was another way--
I’m sure you do. Now take your best ‘schlap. CONTINUED: (CONTINUED) CHERRY REVISED - 01/16/23
I could be merciful and kill you on the
What am I thinking?! We should do this many times!
Will you shut up and trust me?
I’ll make it easier for you.

scenes.heading: EXT. NORTH POLE - MANUFACTURING VERTICAL ALLEY - NIGHT

dialogues.text: I’ve got a signal. O'Malley is here.

scenes.actionPreview: The normally bustling North Pole is still as a photograph, the whole place having come to a grinding HALT with Nick’s absence. In one of the manufacturing quadrants-- -- an old TOY STORE, closed for many years and quaint, by comparison to the more modern parts of sprawling metropolis. The front door

scenes.heading: EXT. NORTH POLE - ALLEY - MOMENTS LATER

dialogues.text: I’ll let the team know you’re back.

Forgive me in advance, if I’m wrong. “Fred” looks confused. When suddenly, without warning, Cal HAULS BACK and CLEANS “Fred’s” CLOCK! “Fred” instantly FALLS to the ground and TRANSFORMS into-- A YULE LAD! Out cold.
I knew it. Yule Lad. We can’t trust anyone.

scenes.actionPreview: Cal and Zoe discretely follow the tracker through a narrow alley-- Then from behind them-- They turn to-- “Fred” (Cal’s E.L.F guy from the opening), who’s been patrolling the streets. Cal and Zoe exchange cautious looks-- “is that really him?” They eye each other for a beat-- tense. Then--

scenes.heading: EXT. NORTH POLE - MAIN PLAZA - CONTINUOUS

dialogues.text: It says he should be right here.

scenes.actionPreview: Cal and Zoe round a corner, into-- the eerily empty Main Plaza, following the signal. The tracker sounds a sustained TONE-- Yet Jack is nowhere to be seen. Cal looks around and his eyes fall on-- Nick’s ORIGINAL WORKSHOP, sunken into the plaza-- Runs beneath the Original Workshop... 107. CONTINUED:

scenes.heading: INT. GLOBING AREA - NIGHT

dialogues.text: Is this happening because I was ditching?
Is it because I slashed Kevin’s tires?!
But you said it was for naughty people, didn’t you?
What did I do? Why is this happening?!
Listen, listen, listen... Pal... Take a deep breath, okay? Just... take a deep breath.
You may have done a couple of things you shouldn’t have but...
Well... a lot of things. It’s a long list.
It is. And we both know it. I haven’t been around. Or involved... Pretty much a non- factor.
I told myself I was doing you a favor. But that was bullshit. It wasn’t good for you and it was terrible for me.
Why for you? CONTINUED: (CONTINUED) GREEN REVISED - 11/20/22
‘Cause... (indicates Dylan) ...look what I’ve missed. (then) I’ve made some big mistakes, buddy. And I know it. CONTINUED: (2) (CONTINUED) PINK REVISED - 11/2/22
But the other thing I know is...
And I’m not asking you to believe me... but I
I think I just got a little nicer.
Naw. Whatever Naughty you got? It comes from
Can we get out of here?
Yeah. But first we gotta find somebody.
Looks like they turned it off...
If you could make any toy in the world real, right now, what would it be?
Thought we lost you there for a minute.
Think it’s that easy to get rid of me?
The one and only Dylan. Your dad’s told me a lot about you.
Welcome to the North Pole. CONTINUED: (5) (CONTINUED) BLUE REVISED - 10/11/22
She brought the old Quatupilcator back online somehow. This thing’s been out of commission since the late 1800s...
It was crankin’ out snowglobes like rat turds and then suddenly...
She’s gonna deliver those globes to everyone on The List.
But the sleigh, the reindeer... won’t lift off--

scenes.actionPreview: Dylan is now having a panic attack-- she said, but-- And seeing Dylan lose it, hearing his panic, Jack suddenly finds a gear that is completely new to him-- a father. CONTINUED: (CONTINUED) GOLDENROD REVISED - 12/04/22 107A. CONTINUED: (CONTINUED) GREEN REVISED - 11/20/22 108. Dylan tries to do so.

scenes.heading: INT. TUNNELS - CONTINUOUS

dialogues.text: We can’t let the Sleigh take off! There’s a subterranean access to the--

scenes.actionPreview: FOLLOWING Cal, who knows these abandoned tunnels like the back of his hand-- They all STOP, turn back to Dylan, who has paused next to a vaulted door. And then they notice what Dylan already did-- a soft, percussive BANGING on the other side of that door-- Cal RUNS OVER-- indeed, someone is POUNDING

scenes.heading: INT. HANGAR - MAIN DECK - PALACE - NIGHT

dialogues.text: Gryla! STOP! --she turns to see-- CAL, JACK, ZOE, DYLAN AND THE ENTIRE E.L.F. SQUAD-- lined up in formation at the entrance. PUSH ON-- Jack-- almost stop time for a second-- as he takes it all in-- the Sleigh, the reindeer, the entire scene... Awe struck. But also, because he is who he is, he notices
Dylan, come with me. --then Goorman (the gnome ELF AGENT)-- rushes them to safety.
Anything nasty takes a swipe at ‘ya, you give ‘em a swipe right back, ‘eh?

scenes.actionPreview: TIGHT ON-- NICK-- still asleep in that hyperbaric chamber. PULL BACK as the chamber itself is LOADED onto the back of THE SLEIGH by Yule Lads-- --and PULL BACK FURTHER to see that the Reindeer are IN CHAINS, being SECURED to the front of the sleigh by a jerry- rigged system. And they’re not happy ab

scenes.heading: INT. MISSION CONTROL -- FLIGHT COMMAND - SAME TIME
scenes.actionPreview: Zoe RUNS up the stairs into Flight Command to find-- three more Yule Lads waiting for her. She PULLS two baton-like Acquiescers, which double as fighting sticks-- then proceeds to BEAT THE HELL out of the Yule Lads in spectacular fashion, ACQUIESCING them, one by one. As Zoe finishes off the last gu

scenes.heading: INT. HANGAR - MAIN DECK - NIGHT
scenes.actionPreview: The Sleigh is getting away! Cal and Jack TAKE OUT a Yule Lad, working together-- --then TEAR OFF after the Sleigh and at the last possible moment, JUMP onto the globing trailer!-- JUST AS the whole caravan passes thru the hangar door onto--

scenes.heading: EXT. RUNWAY - CONTINUOUS
scenes.actionPreview: --the runway bridge-- which, designed as it is for the Sleigh, is covered in snow, a twenty story drop on either side. The Reindeer PULL down the icy runway, HAULING that trailer full of snowglobes. And HANGING off the sides of the trailer, working their way toward the Sleigh-- are Cal and Jack! CON

scenes.heading: EXT. MOVING SLEIGH - TRAILER - CONTINUOUS

dialogues.text: Oh Warrior. What have you done? --then UNLEASHES A SUPER-HUMAN ATTACK! And not with magical rays or spells or anything like that. Straight-up

scenes.actionPreview: The vat of duplicate Glaskäfigs glimmers menacingly between them, as they reach the head of the trailer and make the short but perilous JUMP to the back of the sleigh-- --CLIMBING up alongside Nick’s chamber, Cal sees-- Nick, still fast asleep -- --then DROP onto the deck, behind Gryla who seems not

scenes.heading: EXT. NORTH POLE - SNOWBANKS BENEATH THE RUNWAY - CONT.
scenes.actionPreview: On the ground, 20 stories below, Gryla is passed out in a snow drift. Then she TWITCHES. And her HAND starts to... GROW. The VERY FIRST MOMENT OF A TRANSFORMATION. BACK TO:

scenes.heading: EXT. RUNWAY - CONTINUOUS

dialogues.text: Come on, Red! Wake up... Wake up!
Gryla! It’s time for you to go!
With his power and his list... there’s no limit to what I can do. The Gläskafigs are just the beginning.
If you want to get to him... you’re gonna have to get thru me first. CONTINUED: (CONTINUED) TAN REVISED - 01/24/23
You imbeciles have no idea how to talk to a woman like this.
You took back the Glaskäfig. But you didn’t tell me what you had in mind.
You’ve gone soft. I knew you couldn’t stomach it. But I’m going to finish what we started.
No. You’re doing this to get back at me.
This has nothing to do with you, you narcissistic fool!
And in the month of the Krampusnacht, no less. CONTINUED: (2) (CONTINUED) TAN REVISED - 01/24/23
It’s Christmas Eve! Nobody thinks of
Between Gryla and The Sleigh. On which lies his boss, friend, father figure... And Principal
If you want to take him... you’re gonna have to kill me.
Any last words for your most faithful warrior? CONTINUED: (3) (CONTINUED) TAN REVISED - 01/24/23

Merry Christmas, witch. --as THE REINDEER collide into Ogre Gryla like a runaway freight train-- LIFTING, TOSSLING and ultimately TOSSING HER-- -- INTO THE GIANT GLOBE TRAILER! Snowglobes EXPLODE under her weight and that BRIGHT BLUE LIGHT OVERWHELMS the entire runway!
Look who cat the dragged in.
It’s go time. THE MUSIC KICKS IN-- High intensity “Christmas action score”.
Not a second to waste, Mrs. Claus JUMPS into the command chair, DONS the head-set--
Sky Train, this is Partridge. Back in the chair and back on track.
Good to have you back, Ma’am. CONTINUED: (6) (CONTINUED) GOLDENROD REVISED - 12/04/22
We are currently almost six minutes behind schedule, so we’re gonna run this pre- flight like our hair’s on fire.

scenes.actionPreview: Cal is still trying to revive Nick, gently patting his face-- When suddenly he feels a RUMBLING... As though the bridge itself is shaking. On the runway, Jack feels it to, looks around then spots-- CONTINUED: (CONTINUED) BUFF REVISED - 01/03/23 115. CONTINUED: (CONTINUED) TAN REVISED - 01/24/23 116.

scenes.heading: INT. HANGAR - CONTINUOUS

dialogues.text: We’ll wire your fee first thing in the morning.
You know, MORA could use someone with your skill set.

Think about it. ACROSS THE HANGAR-- Cal stands next to a door, reviewing some final bit of planning with Garcia, when the door OPENS-- --and Nick EMERGES-- COOL as the other side of the pillow, FULL STRENGTH and ready for business. Santa like we’ve never seen before. CONTINUED: (CONTINUED) WHITE DRAFT - 9/24/22
What are you gonna do with her?
We’re going to put her somewhere safe.
Come on! Load up! We gotta move!
Red One, you are clear for take-off.
Bank left, deploy North, heading for the 8th Arrondissement... -- Zoe awed by her detailed knowledge of the ENTIRE WORLD.
racing the rising sun, still just below the horizon, headed for home. And as they skim over the blue, blue Arctic ice,
Dude, we were just in Hawaii!
Santa’s a lot cooler than I thought he was.
I think he must have demolished 4 million cookies.
The guy’s a beast. CONTINUED: (2) (CONTINUED) BUFF REVISED - 01/03/23
I knew you’d get it back.
I lost it there, for a while.
It’s easy to lose it, Cal. The important part is to keep trying.
Nick... I’d like to stay on. If you’ll have me.
You got it, Commander. CONTINUED: (CONTINUED) BUFF REVISED - 01/03/23
(laughs) I think we just saved Christmas.
Did you know it would end up ok?
In each other. In ourselves. In all of you.

scenes.actionPreview: A FLURRY of activity! The Sleigh and the Reindeer in ready position, as a hundred HELPERS rush to make up lost time-- servicing the Sleigh, brushing and feeding the Reindeer, MOUNTING a cargo container, finalizing the route... Off to the side, Dylan watches the spectacle of it all. As Jack sends a m
